answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Yes, it is possible to have portal hypertension (PH) without having end stage liver failure. The commonest cause of PH is cirrhosis of liver and this is reversible depending on the cause and the stage.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
